properties.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands
properties.headline: Rip Current Statement issued February 9 at 3:04AM CST until February 10 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected.

* WHERE...Aransas Islands, Kleberg Islands, Nueces Islands and
Calhoun Islands Counties.

* WHEN...From 6 AM CST this morning through Monday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...These rip currents can become life-threatening to
anyone entering the surf. Rip currents can sweep even the most
experienced swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
properties.instruction:
Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and
float. Don't swim against the current. If able, swim in a
direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the
shore and call or wave for help.

NWSheadline: HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM CST THIS MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON
